import React from 'react' import userPhoto from '../../assets/images/avatar.png' import styles from './users.module.css' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' let User = ({followingInProgress, unfollow, follow, user}) => { return <>
{user.followed ? : }
{user.name}
{'user.status'}
{'user.location.country'}
{'user.location.city'}
 } export default User
